meaning: The report stated that sales rose.
example: state'는 (명사) (어떤' '것'의) '존재' '방식'이나 '물리적'인 '조건', '즉' '상태'를 '의미'합니다. (동사로 '진술하다'는 뜻도 있음)\r\n Please describe the current state of the project.

meaning: We stayed at a hotel.
example: stay'는 (명사) '돛대' '버팀줄'이라는 '뜻'도 '있'으나, (동사) (어떤' '장소'나 '상태'에) '계속' '있다(머무르다, 유지하다)'는 '의미'로 '훨씬' '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n Please stay on the line while I transfer your call.

meaning: The new policy stimulated growth.
example: stimulate'는 (어떤' '활동'이나 '성장'을) '더' '활발'하게 '만들도록' '촉진'하거나 '자극'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The new tax cuts are designed to stimulate investment.

meaning: The contract stipulates that payment be made monthly.
example: stipulate'는 (계약이나' '합의'의 '중요'한 '조건'으로서) (어떤' '것'을 '하거나' '하지' '않을' '것'을) '공식적'으로 '요구'하고 '명시'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The warranty stipulates that repairs must be done by an authorized dealer.

meaning: Data is stored on the server.
example: store'는 (동사) (어떤' '것'을) '나중'에 '쓰기' '위해) '안전'한 '곳'에 '두거나' '모은다(저장/보관하다)'는 '의미'입니다. (명사로 '상점'이라는 뜻도 있음)\r\n Sensitive data should be stored on a secure server.

meaning: We streamlined the workflow.
example: streamline'은 (명사) '유선형'이라는 '뜻'도 '있'으나, (동사) (조직'이나 '과정' '등'을) '더' '단순'하고 '효율적'으로 '만든다(간소화하다)'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n The company is looking for ways to streamline its operations.

meaning: We strive to achieve excellence.
example: strive'는 (어떤' '것'을 '성취'하기 '위해) '진지'한 '노력'이나 '에너지'를 '쏟는다(애쓰다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We must strive to meet the deadline.

meaning: Please submit the form to HR.
example: submit'는 (권위'에 '굴복하다)라는 '뜻' '외'에, (서류,' '지원서,' '보고서' '등'을) '(검토' '받기' '위해) '공식적'으로 '낸다(제출하다)'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n Applicants must submit all required documents by March 1st.

meaning: You can substitute honey for sugar.
partOfSpeech: substitute A for B(=B를 A로 대체).
example: substitute'는 (명사) (어떤' '사람'이나 '사물'의) '자리'나 '기능'을 '대신'하는 '사람' '또는' '물건'(대리인, '대체물)을 '의미'합니다.\r\n A substitute will teach the class while Mr. Brown is away.

meaning: Subtract 10 from 50.
example: subtract'는 (어떤' '수'나 '양'을) (다른' '것'에서) '덜어내'거나 '뺀다(공제하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The 10% discount will be subtracted from the total amount at checkout.

meaning: She succeeded in business. / He succeeded his father.
example: succeed'는 (성공하다)라는 '뜻' '외'에, (직위'나 '재산' '등'을) '물려받'거나 '뒤를' '잇는다'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n She is expected to succeed the current CEO upon his retirement.

meaning: He suggested going out for dinner.
example: suggest'는 (어떤' '아이디어'나 '행동' '계획' '등'을) '고려'해 '보도록) '언급'하거나 '제안한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We suggest booking your tickets well in advance.

meaning: The job suits me perfectly.
example: suit'는 (명사) '정장'이라는 뜻 외에, (동사) '특정' '목적'이나 '사람'에게 '알맞다(적합하다)'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다. (제공된 '정장' 정의도 맞습니다.)\r\n This location would be an excellent suit for our new restaurant.

meaning: They supplied us with food.
example: supply'는 (필요'하거나 '이용' '가능'한) (상품' '등'의) '양'이나 '수량', '즉' '공급(량)'을 '의미'하는 '명사'입니다.\r\n Due to high demand the supply of this product is limited.

meaning: Sales surpassed expectations.
example: surpass'는 (기존'의 '수준,' '기록,' '기대' '등'을) '넘어서' '더' '낫거나' '크'게 '된다(능가하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n This quarter's profits are expected to surpass our initial projections.

meaning: They surveyed customer satisfaction.
example: survey'는 (동사) (어떤' '것'의 '상태,' '상황,' '가치' '등'을) '검토'하거나 '평가'하다, '혹은' (명사) '의견' '수렴'을 '위한' '설문' '조사'를 '의미'합니다.\r\n The company conducted a survey to measure employee satisfaction.

meaning: The flight was suspended due to fog.
example: suspend'는 (권리,' '직책' '등'을) '일시적'으로 '박탈'한다는 '뜻' '외'에, (어떤' '활동'이나 '운영' '등'을) '잠시' '멈추'거나 '중단한다'는 '의미'로 '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n The ferry service was suspended due to bad weather.

meaning: The company sustained heavy losses.
example: sustain'은 (어떤' '상태'나 '활동' '등'을) '오랜' '시간' '동안' '계속' '살아' '있게' '한다(지속하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We need a long-term strategy to sustain growth in a competitive market.

meaning: Please take your seat. / He took his son to school.
example: take'는 (손'에 '쥐다)라는 '기본' '뜻' '외'에, (수업'을) '듣다', (시간'이) '걸리다', (조치'를) '취하다' '등' '매우' '다양한' '의미'로 '쓰'이는 '동사'입니다.\r\n It will take approximately three business days to process your request.

meaning: She talked to her boss about the plan.
example: talk'는 (spoken' 'words'나 'sign' 'language'를 '이용'하여) '생각'을 '표현'하거나 '교환'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We need to talk about the project timeline.

meaning: She tore the paper. / The flag tore in half.
example: tear'는 (힘'을 '가해) (종이' '등'의 '일부'를) '분리'시키거나 '찢는다'는 '의미'이며, '토익'에서는 'wear and tear(마모)'라는 '관용구'로 '등장'할 '수' '있습니다.\r\n (The warranty does not cover damage from normal wear and tear.)

meaning: He tends to exaggerate.
example: tend'는 (어떤' '방식'으로) '행동'하거나 (어떤' '상태'가 '될) '가능성'이나 '경향'을 '보인다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Prices for electronics tend to drop during the holiday season.

meaning: The contract was terminated early.
example: terminate'는 (어떤' '것'의) '끝'을 '형성'하거나, (계약' '등'을) '공식적'으로 '끝낸다(종료/해지하다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The management has the right to terminate the contract with prior notice.

meaning: The software tracks user behavior.
example: track'은 (명사) '발자국'이라는 '뜻'도 '있'으나, (동사) (어떤' '것'의 '움직임'이나 '진행' '과정'을) '계속' '살피'고 '파악한다(추적하다)'는 '의미'로 '훨씬' '자주' '쓰'입니다.\r\n You can track the delivery status of your package online.

meaning: She transferred money to her account.
example: transfer'는 (한' '사람,' '장소,' '상황'에서 '다른' '곳'으로) '옮기'거나 '이동시킨다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다. (특히 돈을 '이체하다')\r\n I need to transfer some funds from my savings account.

meaning: Try to finish this. / Try restarting it.
example: try'는 (어떤' '것'을) '이루'기 '위해) '시도'하거나 '노력'한다는 '의미', '혹은' '(새로운' '것'을) '시험' '삼아' '써본다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We are trying a new advertising agency to improve our marketing.

meaning: The patient underwent surgery.
example: undergo'는 (주로' '변화,' '개혁,' '검사,' '시련' '등' '필요'하거나 '중요'한 '일'을) '경험'하거나 '견뎌낸다(겪다/받다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n All new employees must undergo a background check.

meaning: The firm undertook the project.
example: undertake'는 (중요'하거나 '어려운) '일'이나 '책임' '등'을 '스스로' '떠맡'아 '시작'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The firm will undertake a study on the feasibility of the project.

meaning: They urged students to apply early.
example: urge'는 (어떤' '것'을 '하도록) '간절'하게 '혹은' '강력'하게 '요청'하거나 '주장'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n We strongly urge all members to read the new policy carefully.

meaning: Please verify your email address.
example: verify'는 (어떤' '것'이) '진실'인지 '정확'한지 '혹은' '사실'인지를 '확립'하거나 '확인'한다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n Please verify that your shipping address is correct before confirming the order.

meaning: The bank waived the late fee.
example: waive'는 (자신'의 '법적' '권리'나 '요구' '사항' '등'을) '자발적'으로 '포기'하거나 '면제'해준다는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The bank has agreed to waive the overdraft fee.

meaning: She withdrew her money from the account.
example: withdraw'는 (은행'에서 '돈'을) '찾는다(인출하다)', '혹은' (시장에서' '제품'을) '회수'하거나 (제안'을) '철회한다'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n The company decided to withdraw the product from the market.

meaning: The structure withstood the storm.
example: withstand'는 (어려움'이나 '강한' '물리적' '힘' '등'에) '굳'건히 '맞서' '저항'하거나 '성공적'으로 '버텨낸다(견디다)'는 '의미'의 '동사'입니다.\r\n This material is designed to withstand high temperatures.

meaning: I would like to order coffee. / I would like you to come.
example: would like'은 (무엇'을 '하거나' '갖기'를) '원한다'고 '정중'하게 '말할' '때' '사용'하는 '관용' '표현'입니다.\r\n I would like to speak to the hotel manager please.
